title: Logan Paul threatens to 'kill' KSI in upcoming rematch
text:
Logan Paul has threatened to ‘kill’ KSI in their upcoming boxing rematch next month.

The 24-year-old travelled to London for a press conference after high demand to see the pair come face-to-face once again, and he was met with quite the hostile atmosphere.

Fans threw anything they could possibly get their hands on at Paul, from plastic bottles to bags.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

It failed to faze Paul, however, who stood on his chair and told them to ‘hit him’ if they’re to throw.

The American was in boyish mood and when providing some less cheesy trash talk, told host True Geordie and the more than 4,000 in attendance that he could ‘kill’ KSI in the ring.

“I might kill this man. JJ is on his fifth abortion, his fifth.

“Five babies – dead. I might return the favour and kill you.”

KSI hit back with his own harsh words, telling Paul he would ‘finish him off’ after their rematch.

The two YouTubers fight at Staples Centre on 9 November in Los Angeles, California.
